Pre-Game Insights: Wanindu Hasaranga returns to the squad after recovering from a hamstring injury.
Dilshan Madushanka returns from a hamstring injury.
Chamindu Wickramasinghe earns his maiden ODI call-up.
Sri Lanka aims to maintain their winning run from the recent 2-1 T20I series win over West Indies.
Miscellaneous Highlights: All matches set to take place at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium.
The ODI series begins on October 20, followed by the second and third ODIs on October 23 and 26, respectively.
